# main

## Index

- [Config](#config)

## Schemas

### Config

Config contains a resource map and transformation functions.

#### Attributes

| name | type | description | default value |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
|**callback**|() -> str|||
|**filter**|(str, int) -> bool|||
|**process**|([ResourceMap](#resourcemap)) -> [str]|||
|**resources**|[ResourceMap](#resourcemap)|||
|**transform**|([Resource](#resource)) -> [Resource](#resource)|||
### Resource

Resource represents a generic resource with indexed metadata.

#### Attributes

| name | type | description | default value |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
|**metadata**|{str:str}|||
|**name** `required`|str|||
### ResourceMap

ResourceMap is a map of resources indexed by name.

#### Attributes

| name | type | description | default value |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
|**[index]**|str: [Resource](#resource)|||
